analysis.key_quote: Changing retirement contributions and benefit calculations for existing employees is changing the agreement made between employee and employer and endangers the well being of dedicated civil servants making retirement decisions and plans under the established sets of rules over potentially decades of employment.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes changes to retirement contributions and benefits for existing employees, emphasizing the importance of maintaining agreements and protections for civil servants. This aligns with concerns about employee rights and the integrity of the merit-based system.
